name: placenxt
description: PlaceNxt - Get Placed. Get Ahead. An AI-Powered Career Platform for Students

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.infra.yml up -d && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/api-gateway" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/auth-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/resume-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/scoring-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/skill-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/job-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/application-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/interview-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/validation-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/billing-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/admin-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/recruiter-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/email-tracking-service"
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/resume-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/scoring-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/skill-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/job-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/application-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/interview-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/validation-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/billing-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/admin-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/recruiter-service" "npm run dev -w @smartcareer/email-tracking-service"
scripts.start: npm run start -w @smartcareer/database && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:services" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start -w @smartcareer/api-gateway" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/auth-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/resume-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/scoring-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/skill-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/job-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/application-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/interview-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/validation-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/billing-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/admin-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/recruiter-service" "npm run start -w @smartcareer/email-tracking-service"
scripts.build:shared: npm run build -w @smartcareer/database && npm run build -w @smartcareer/shared

scripts.build:job-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @smartcareer/job-service
